page.title: 10EDINBANE - JOCK MACFARLOW
page.content: Jock Macfarlow is a shepherd on Greshornish Estate and sometimes I help him on a Saturday, especially at lambing. He is also a carpenter to trade, but he changed to shepherding because there was not any work. At first he worked with his father; who is a shepherd. Jock us well-known as he has won a lot of prizes at sheep-dog trials. This is the second year he has won the top award for dog-handling. About ten years ago, Jock played shinty for Portree and for Skye. Once he played as a forward when the Skye team travelled to Killarney to the Pan-Celtic festival. In his spare time, Jock sometimes carves handles for shepherd's crooks.
